Steps: 1. Navigate to the homepage. 2. Verify the homepage loads without errors.
Expected Result: Homepage loads successfully with all elements visible.

Steps: 1. Verify all links in the navigation bar. 2. Click each link and ensure it redirects correctly.
Expected Result: All navigation links work as expected.

Steps: 1. Navigate to the product page. 2. Verify product name, price, and description.
Expected Result: Product details are displayed correctly without missing information.

Steps: 1. Select a product. 2. Click 'Add to Cart'. 3. Verify the cart updates with the selected product.
Expected Result: Product is added to the cart successfully.

Steps: 1. Navigate to the Pages section. 2. Verify links to sub-pages work.
Expected Result: All sub-pages are accessible and load correctly.

Steps: 1. Navigate to the About Us page. 2. Verify the content is accurate and loads properly.
Expected Result: About Us page content displays correctly.

Steps: 1. Navigate to the Contact page. 2. Submit the contact form with valid data.
1. Navigate to the FAQs page. 2. Verify all questions and answers are displayed.
Expected Result: FAQs page displays all content correctly.

Steps: 1. Add a product to the cart. 2. Navigate to the Cart page. 3. Verify the cart contents.
Expected Result: Cart page displays the correct products.

Steps: 1. Navigate to the Checkout page. 2. Complete the checkout process with valid data.
1. Add a product to the Wishlist. 2. Navigate to the Wishlist page. 3. Verify the wishlist contents.
